original_text: The angel who talked to me had a long gold stick. He used it to measure things. So he could measure the city and its gates and its walls.
korean_text: 내게 말하는 자가 그 성과 그 문들과 성곽을 측량하려고 금 갈대 자를 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: The angel who talked to me
He used it to measure things
So he could measure the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 도시를 측정할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and its gates and its walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 성문들과 그 벽들을 측정할 수 있었습니다
